revision.text:
{{description|1=en|2={{{1|}}}|3=English|inline={{{inline|}}}}}
== Usage == Usage: * '''{{en|'''''English translation'''''}}''' * '''{{en|'''''English translation'''''|inline=yes}}''' Result: {{en|English translation}} or {{en|English translation|inline=yes}}. See also [[Commons:Multilinguality]]
== Utilisation == Utilisation : '''{{en|'''''Version anglophone'''''}}''' Résultat : {{en|Version anglophone}} Voir aussi le multilinguisme à ''[[Commons:Multilinguality]]''
== Verwendung == Verwendung: '''{{en|'''''Englische Übersetzung'''''}}''' Resultat: {{en|Englische Übersetzung}} Siehe auch [[Commons:Multilinguality]]
== Aanwände == Aanwände: '''{{en|'''''Övversaz op änglesh'''''}}''' Erruß kütt: {{en|Övversaz op änglesh}} Siehe auch [[Commons:Multilinguality]]
== Gebruik == Gebruik: '''{{en|'''''Engelse vertaling'''''}}''' Resultaat: {{en|Englise vertaling}} Zie ook [[Commons:Multilinguality]]
[[Category:Internationalization templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]

{{#if:{{{inline|}}}||
}}'''{{#language:{{{1}}}}}{{{5|}}}:''' {{{2|}}}{{#if:{{{inline|}}}||
}} ---- Parameters: *1=wikicode for the language and name of the CSS formating class (mandatory) *2=description text (optional, default is empty) *3=title for tooltip (optional, default is empty) **name=alternative parameter name for parameter 3 *4=standard code for lang tag in HTML (optional, default is same as parameter 1) *5=extension text shown after the language name before colon (optional, default is empty) *inline=optional, default is empty string. When set to any value different from an empty string, forces the template to be displayed inline, so that it does not break the current paragraph (i.e. that makes possible to put several descriptions side by side on a single line) [[Category:Internationalization templates]]
